0.9.10.name: wordpress/aditroreqruit-widget
0.9.10.description:
This plugin uses Aditro reqruit (aditroreqruit.com) to list available jobs.

Widget to show jobs available from the service Aditro recruit.

Very simple shortcode [aditrorecruit] to show all available jobs with description, not working without the widget settings.

All settings are in the widget, check screenshot for details.

Contact Jonas Hjalmarsson, Hultsfreds kommun on Twitter @hjalmarsson for questions.
